str2: And, even, also, namely.
Third. Ordinal from treis; third; neuter a third part, or a third time, thirdly.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To accompany, attend, follow. Properly, to be in the same way with, i.e. To accompany.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pros and a probable derivative of kuon; to fawn or crouch to, i.e. prostrate oneself in homage.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Properly: a wild beast, hence: any animal; met: a brute. Diminutive from the same as thera; a dangerous animal.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
An image, likeness, bust. From eiko; a likeness, i.e. statue, profile, or representation, resemblance.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
Sculpture; engraving, a stamp, sign. From the same as charax; a scratch or etching, i.e. Stamp, or scupltured figure.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The forehead, front. From meta and ops; the forehead.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A hand.
